item.title: An on-going and unordered catalogue of useful Python stuff
More Python mocking fun
item.description: This post is a collection of python unit testing ‘gotchas’. Mocking external packages import sys import unittest from unittest.mock import patch, Mock, call, mock_open from io import StringIO, TextIOWrapper mock_os = Mock() sys.modules["os"] = mock_os from config_editor import ConfigEditor Now we have effectively mocked all actual file I/O in our tests Mocking in-built methods and file I/O Super useful if you want to test a unit that uses the builtin open method.
